name: Speed Gill
text: On Play: Reveal the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck. If that card had (Whitebeard Pirates) included in its type, this character gains Rush this turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

effect.text: Reveal the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck. If that card had (Whitebeard Pirates) included in its type, this character gains Rush this turn.
